naslov: Atraktivna duplex kuća s pogledom na more – Stupin Čeline, Rogoznica (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji duplex kuće na mirnoj i atraktivnoj lokaciji u mjestu Stupin Čeline, nedaleko od Rogoznice. Smještena samo 75 m od mora i oko 300 m od prve uređene plaže, ova nekretnina nudi idealan spoj udobnosti i blizine prirode. Kuća ima ukupnu površinu od 260 m² raspoređenu na četiri etaže, s brojnim mogućnostima korištenja i prilagodbe. Prizemlje U prizemlju su tri odvojene jedinice sa zasebnim ulazima, savršene za pretvaranje u apartmane za turistički najam. Prostrano dvorište s kaminom ispred kuće idealno je za druženje, objedovanje i uživanje na svježem zraku. I.kat Prvi kat čini potpuno opremljen stan s dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonicom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom, dnevnim boravkom i balkonom. Stan je lijepo uređen, redovito održavan i trenutno se koristi za turistički najam. Godinama je uspješno popunjen tijekom sezone te ima izvrsne ocjene i recenzije. II. kat Na drugom katu nalazi se prostran dvoetažni stan. Donja etaža sadrži kuhinju s blagovaonicom i izlazom na balkon, dnevni boravak i jednu spavaću sobu. Gornja etaža, u potkrovlju, obiluje drvenim detaljima i sastoji se od tri dodatne spavaće sobe, čineći ovaj prostor toplim i ugodnim za obitelj ili goste. Zahvaljujući povoljnom rasporedu, površini i položaju, ova nekretnina nudi niz mogućnosti: Turistički najam: Izvrsna prilika za investiciju, potencijal za visoke prihode zahvaljujući odvojenim jedinicama i povoljnoj lokaciji. Privatni dom: Idealna kuća za obitelj koja želi mirno okruženje s pogledom na more. Vikendica: Savršen bijeg od gradske gužve. ** Razgledavanje nekretnine moguće je uz prethodno potpisivanje Ugovora o posredovanju, sukladno važećim zakonima o zaštiti podataka i posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija: 3% Za sve dodatne informacije ili dogovor oko razgledavanja, obratite se: Željana – 091/561-5115 ********************************************************************** Attractive Duplex House with a Sea View – Stupin Čeline, Rogoznica We are mediating the sale of a duplex house located in a peaceful and attractive area in Stupin Čeline, near Rogoznica. Situated just 75 meters from the sea and approximately 300 meters from the nearest beach, this property offers the perfect combination of comfort and proximity to nature. The house has a total area of 260 m², spread across four levels, providing numerous possibilities for use and adaptation. Ground Floor The ground floor consists of three separate units, each with its own entrance, making them perfect for conversion into tourist rental apartments. A spacious courtyard with a fireplace is located in front of the house, ideal for dining, socializing, and enjoying the fresh air. First Floor The first floor features a fully equipped apartment with two bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen with a dining area, a living room, and a balcony. The apartment is beautifully furnished, regularly maintained, and currently used for tourist rentals. It has been successfully booked during the tourist season for years and boasts excellent reviews and ratings. Second Floor On the second floor, there is a spacious two-level apartment. The lower level includes a kitchen with a dining area and access to a balcony, a living room, and one bedroom. The upper level, located in the attic, is rich in wooden details and comprises three additional bedrooms, creating a warm and cozy space for family or guests. Thanks to its favorable layout, size, and location, this property offers multiple possibilities: Tourist Rental: An excellent Investment Opportunity, high income potential due to separate units and its prime location. Private Home: An ideal house for a family seeking a peaceful setting with a sea view. Vacation Home: A perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city. Additional Information: Property viewings are possible only after signing a Brokerage Agreement, in accordance with current data protection and real estate brokerage laws. Agency commission: 3% For more information or to arrange a viewing, please contact: Željana +385915615115
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
